ADS.Text4: Rod is shown as an evil person. He freezes kids and uses their flesh for ice cream. He is intelligent, being able to lure children to his ice cream truck and kidnap them without anyone noticing..
ADS.Text5: Long with the letter she gives him the recipe for Joseph Sullivan's secret ice cream , the result of this may caused physiological trauma for Rod not only for his father's death but to became crazy and extremely angry at particular times in the game.
